name.baseName: Aluminum Recycling ; Recycled Aluminum Ingots ; Scrap Aluminum ; 2010
铝再生 ; 再生铝锭 ; 废铝 ; 2010年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The recycled aluminum ingots produced from this process are primarily utilized in the manufacture of products where secondary quality aluminum is acceptable. Such applications include but are not limited to automotive parts, construction materials, household items, and in certain cases, packaging. The ingots may also serve as a raw material for producing aluminum alloys, considering the varied properties of scrap aluminum used in the recycling process.
该过程生产的再生铝锭主要用于生产可接受二级质量铝的产品。这些应用包括但不限于汽车部件、建筑材料、家用物品，以及在某些情况下的包装材料。再生铝锭也可作为生产铝合金的原材料，考虑到回收过程中使用的废铝的不同属性。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The recycled aluminum ingots produced from this process are primarily utilized in the manufacture of products where secondary quality aluminum is acceptable. Such applications include but are not limited to automotive parts, construction materials, household items, and in certain cases, packaging. The ingots may also serve as a raw material for producing aluminum alloys, considering the varied properties of scrap aluminum used in the recycling process.
该过程生产的再生铝锭主要用于生产可接受二级质量铝的产品。这些应用包括但不限于汽车部件、建筑材料、家用物品，以及在某些情况下的包装材料。再生铝锭也可作为生产铝合金的原材料，考虑到回收过程中使用的废铝的不同属性。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this LCA data set, it is essential to incorporate the indicated year of the data (2010) to maintain temporal accuracy. Due to potential changes in technology and recycling practices, subsequent LCA studies might require updates with more recent data sources. Users should ensure that end-of-life recycling credits or burdens are appropriately allocated based on the specific context of the aluminum's application. The inclusion of electricity and other background data necessitates careful consideration to reflect the current energy mix and technological standards in China, especially if comparing to global or regional averages.
使用此LCA数据集时，必须包含数据年份（2010年），以保持时间上的准确性。由于技术和回收实践可能的变化，后续的LCA研究可能需要使用更新的数据来源。用户应根据铝的具体应用情境，适当分配生命周期结束时的回收信用或负担。电力和其他背景数据的包含需要仔细考虑，以反映中国当前的能源组合和技术标准，特别是在与全球或区域平均值进行比较时。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
